author: igv4321
body:
The content of this PR is the same as the PR #15324 but with merge conflicts fixed. Below are the original comments which came with PR #15324:

Implementation of the "HFFlexibleTimeCheck" Phase 1 HF reconstruction algorithm with associated database classes. Some refactoring of the existing code to eliminate duplication.

This pull request has been discussed at
https://indico.cern.ch/event/559519/contributions/2257746/attachments/1317838/1975047/notes.pdf

I would appreciate quick approval. There are some changes in DataFormats needed for subsequent developments.
title: Realistic phase1 hf reco retry
